mapper.select: select s.SCREEN_NO as screenNo, s.SCREEN_NAME as screenName, s.SCREEN_TOTAL_SEAT as totalSeat, st.SHOW_TYPE_NO as showTypeNo, st.SHOW_TYPE_NAME as showTypeName from SHOW_TYPE st, SHOW_SCHEDULE ss, SCREEN s where st.SHOW_TYPE_NO=ss.SHOW_TYPE_NO and ss.SCREEN_NO = s.SCREEN_NO and s.THEATER_NO = #{theaterNo} and ss.movie_no = #{movieNo} and ss.SHOW_SCHEDULE_START_TIME = #{startTime}
